entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
